subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Baylor, which lost 8 of its first 10 Big 12 games this season, continued its late-season turnaround, capitalizing on Nebraska’s cold first-half shooting.
snippet: Baylor, which lost 8 of its first 10 Big 12 games this season, continued its late-season turnaround, capitalizing on Nebraska’s cold first-half shooting.
